metadata.name: Maria corte, Cuerpos divinos de noche y día
metadata.description:
'Cuerpos divinos' (divine bodies) is the title of a posthumous novel by Cuban writer Guillermo Cabrera Infante.
 In 2019, Penguin Random House commissioned María Corte to design the covers for its Cabrera Infante collection.
 These divine bodies have taken on new life: on the one hand, in a gigantic 200 x 200 cm canvas and, on the other, in this beautiful digital animation in which the landscape magically changes from night to day

 Artts, a limited liability company, with registered offices in Belgium, certifies to have the rights to create this limited edition of NFTs with Maria Corte's collection 'Transits'.
 Originally minted by Artts, on Ethereum blockchain.
